sources.title: How Fernando Pessoa Saved Portugal 2018
sources.description: How Fernando Pessoa Saved Portugal 2018 The director discusses his new "mini-film," devoted to the great Portuguese poet, advertising, and the fight to bring Coca-Cola to Portugal. With director Eugène Green, it’s always key to be attentive to one’s surroundings. Accordingly, French cinema’s foremost native New Yorker agreed to meet me on a picturesque piazza where he was spending the morning with an espresso and getting some writing done.   Green had arrived in muggy Locarno, Switzerland for the premiere of his newest work, the “mini-film,” How Fernando Pessoa Saved Portugal. Addeddate 2021-02-11 23:14:29 Identifier como-fernando-pessoa-salvou-portugal-2018-1 Scanner Internet Archive HTML5 Uploader 1.6.4
